summary.name: Iphone 12
summary.description: The iPhone 12 is a smartphone developed and manufactured by Apple. It was released in October 2020 with a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display anf a resolution of 2532 x 1170 pixels. The phone is powered by Apple's A14 Bionic chip, which is built on a 5-nanometer process and provides improved performance and energy efficiency. The iPhone 12 has a dual-camera system, with a 12-megapixel ultra-wide camera and a 12-megapixel wide camera, both with Night mode and Deep Fusion technology. The front-facing camera is a 12-megapixel TrueDepth camera that supports Portrait mode, Night mode, and 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording. The phone also comes in five different colors: black, white, red, green, and blue. It also supports 5G connectivity and has improved wireless charging capabilities with MagSafe, which allows for magnetic attachment of accessories like cases and chargers.

overview.name: Lithium
overview.description: Iphone batteries, which is one of the most essential parts of an iphone, is made up of lithium-ion technology which allows for a faster and more durable charge. Chile's lithium is found in underground reservoirs of salty water. Miners have only to pump this valuable liquid to the surface. The liquid is pumped out and left to dry in the sun. The resulting material is made into lithium carbonate and then processed into just lithium.

overview.name: Aluminum
overview.description: An Iphone 12's enclosure is strictly made of aluminum which is a resource used by apple. It is extracted from an ore called bauxite with high aluminum content. Aluminum is usally a resource used to assemble logical boards and circuit boards.

overview.name: Iron
overview.description: Iron is extracted from iron ore and is one of Apples most important minerals used for the hardware of iphone components. Iron is mostly used to compose iphone speakers and microphones.

overview.name: Apple HQ
overview.description: Most of Apple's engineers, events, and developers are all located in Apple's headquarters. Most design and the majority of employees are all located in this HQ. After the iPhone is fully assembled and ready to be sold, it is shipped to Cupertino California for packaging and then all the products are shipped to Apple distribution centers all around the globe

overview.name: Copper
overview.description: An iphone typically consists of 6 grams of copper. It is usually extracted from oxide and sulfide ores. Copper is typically used to make wires and connectors in mobile phones.

overview.name: Foxconn IPhone Factory
overview.description: After all the natural resources have been turned into the necessary parts for the iPhone, all the parts are sent to a factory in Shenzhen, China, owned by Foxconn. Here, the assembly of all the parts are put together to create the IPhone.

overview.name: Super Retina XDR Display
overview.description: Apple's super retina XDR display included in all iphone 12's allows users to interact with their phones including extremly high graphics. The display detects touch with an electrical current which runs through it. When a user touches the screen, the current makes contact with that exact spot. The screen are manufactured by assembling a sandwhich of two thin sheets of glass. Samsung leads OLED displays to apple.

overview.name: A14 Bionic Chip
overview.description: Apples A14 bionic chip includes a 16-core neural engine, machine learning accelerators in the CPU, and 4-core graphics architecture. This chip is basically what allows the Iphone 12 to function. It also allows the phone to perform up to 11 trillion operations per second. The chip also allows for new security features including secure enclave. TSMC was the manufacterer of all A14 chips produced for the Iphone 12

location.address: Hsinchu in Northern Taiwan, Southern Taiwan and Central Taiwan

overview.name: Battery
overview.description: Batteries are small containers of chemical energy. When a smartphone is plugged into the mains, electricity is used to reset a chemical reaction within the battery. This allows for the transfer of electrons from the negative anode to the cathode which is the positive end of the battery. Once charged, the battery can then create electricity by driving electrons through a circuit. Iphone batteries are manufactered by Amperex Technology LTD.

overview.name: Rear Camera
overview.description: Apple's rear camera is made up of two cameras. One is a main camera and another is an ultra wide. These two camera simultaneously work together to create a seamless photography experience for users. Sony currently maufactures the sensors of the camera while LG supplies the camera modules for the iphone.

overview.name: Apple Retail Stores
overview.description: Apple is very well known for having their own personal retail stores which hold all of their products. Another reason their retail stores are so important are due to the on site technicians who are able to troubelshoot and repair all Apple products when needed. Currently, Apple has a total of 273 Apple retail locations across the entire United States. It is also estimated that Apple is located in a 25 total countries across the world.

location.address: All across the US, Japan, UK, Canada, Italy, Germany, France, Spain, Hong Kong, etc

overview.name: Rear Glass
overview.description: The glass on the iPhone 12 lies flush with the metal frame rather than curved up like in previous models which left more of the glass exposed. Apple says that design choice alone will make the back and front twice as durable as older models. This glass if manufactered by Corning, located in Kentucky and many other locations.

overview.name: Best Buy
overview.description: Best buy is a company that sells most major tech company products. They are very well known for selling authentic and pre-owned Apple products. They are currently found in the United States, Mexico, and Canada.

overview.name: Major Carrier Stores(Verizon, T-Mobile, At&T)
overview.description: Many major companies like Verizon, T-Mobile, Sprint, and AT&T also sell brand new and unlocked Iphones for all customers. Many consumers enjoy buying their phones through their major carrier because they are sometimes offered more trade-in value, better finance options, and an activated phone when they leave a store.

location.address: AT&T has people based in 31 countries while TMOBILE and Verizon are supported across the globe with most retailors in the United States.

overview.name: Gold
overview.description: Many Iphone 12's use gold for pins, relays and connectors. Other hardware components that send signals or need to remain flexible also use small amounts of Gold.

location.address: Gold is mainly found within the United States.(California).

overview.name: Gold
overview.description: Many Iphone 12's use gold for pins, relays and connectors. Other hardware components that send signals or need to remain flexible also use small amounts of Gold.

location.address: Gold is mainly found within the United States(Nevada).

overview.name: Speaker
overview.description: Iron is used to create the speakers and microphones of all iphones. Perhaps the most important use for the rare earth metal neodymium is in an alloy with iron used to make very strong permanent magnets. This makes it possible to miniaturize many electronic devices, including mobile phones, microphones, loudspeakers and electronic musical instruments.
